_header: Worship of virtue is the meed
_description: Carol to St. George—three quatrains and burden: ‘Enfors we vs withall our myght / To loue seynt georg owr lady knyght’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Worschip of vertu ys þe medeand sewyth hym ay of
                    ryght…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…And with hys banner vs ouer spredeYf we hym loue with all our
                    myght
